title: Poison Indicator
body: I believe that the poison indicator could have a little VFX update, it looks kind of derpy and old imo. Three bubling purple blobs. I think it has enough clarity and it is not a priority in clarity right now, but the game would look cooler with a little update like that, it would also mean a general VFX update for certain champions like{{champion:69}}   ,{{champion:17}}   and {{champion:27}}  .
